metadata.title: CVE-2019-10162 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability has been found in PowerDNS Authoritative Server beforeversions 4.1.10, 4.0.8 allowing an authorized user to cause the server toexit by inserting a crafted record in a MASTER type zone under theircontrol. The issue is due to the fact that the Authoritative Server willexit when it runs into a parsing error while looking up the NS/A/AAAArecords it is about to use for an outgoing notify.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
